Subject: Framework Selection
Description: Selection of the foundational web framework for the project.
Rationale: React's component-based architecture aligns well with the SRP and decomposition principles required for single-word naming. Its vast ecosystem provides tools for performance optimization at scale.

Subject: SVG Handling
Description: How to handle SVG assets as reusable React components.
Rationale: This plugin integrates seamlessly with Vite's build process, allowing direct import of SVGs as components (`import ... from './icon.svg?react'`), which is efficient and type-safe.

Subject: CSS-in-JS Strategy
Description: Choosing a library for component-level styling that integrates with React and a design token system.
Rationale: It allows for creating styled primitive components, has excellent TypeScript support, and works naturally with a `ThemeProvider` to consume design tokens from `theme.ts`.

Subject: Icon Loading Performance
Description: Ensuring that icons, which can be numerous, do not negatively impact the application's initial load time.
Rationale: This pattern code-splits each icon, so the JavaScript for an icon is only fetched from the server when the icon is first rendered, rather than being part of the main bundle.
